name: Voxels read/write libraries
short_description:
This project will develop libraries, initially in C, for reading and writing voxelised microstructures in programs. The hole cubic (or prismatic) volume must be discretised using aregular grid.
Functions will write/read hypermatrixes like voxel[x][y][z].
